document.full_text: connecticut's 53-41 win over butler in the n.c.a.a. men's basketball championship game monday night attracted an average of 20.1 million viewers, down 19 percent from last year's 23.9 million when duke beat butler by 2 points in a more compelling game.
document.title: viewership falls for men's n.c.a.a. final
lines_and_colors: connecticut's 53-41 win over butler in the n.c.a.a. men's basketball championship game monday night attracted an average of 20.1 million viewers, down 19 percent from last year's 23.9 million when duke beat butler by 2 points in a more compelling game.
